    DEM to 3D mesh

    dem_to_mesh.Rd

    This function is very slow and needs work.

    dem_to_mesh(dem, plot = TRUE)

    Arguments

    dem

    A RasterLayer object

    plot

    Logical. Plot the 3D mesh using rgl.

    Value

    A 3D points cloud for raster cell corners

    Examples

    raster <- habtools::sim_xyz(10, 6, 0.1, 2, dem = TRUE)
mesh <- habtools::dem_to_mesh(raster)
#> Error: 'mesh3d' is not an exported object from 'namespace:rgl'

horse <- raster::aggregate(habtools::horseshoe, 100)
mesh_horse <- habtools::dem_to_mesh(horse)
#> Error: 'mesh3d' is not an exported object from 'namespace:rgl'
